caption:
This photograph depicts a devastated forest landscape. The ground is covered with debris, including splintered and charred tree trunks, branches, and stumps. The soil appears to be dark and muddy, possibly scorched or saturated with moisture. The scene suggests recent logging activity or the aftermath of a natural disaster, such as a fire. Wisps of smoke or steam can be seen rising from the ground in several areas.

The background shows a slope with similar destruction; trees that still stand are bare and stripped of foliage, indicating extreme damage to the area's vegetation. The entire scene conveys a somber mood, highlighting intense environmental impact and the stark reality of deforestation or natural catastrophe. The lighting in the photo is subdued, which might be due to overcast conditions or the time of day, further enhancing the somber feeling of the scene.
title: Buffer strip burning in a slash burn in Olympic National Timberland, Washington, near Olympic National Park.
